database_info.regulatory_note: Based on FDA major allergens (9) plus common supplement allergens and EU additional allergens

common_allergens.supplement_context: Very common in protein powders and as lecithin emulsifier
common_allergens.notes: One of the 9 major allergens. Must be declared on labels.

common_allergens.supplement_context: Extremely common in protein supplements
common_allergens.notes: Common in protein supplements. Lactose-free options available.

common_allergens.supplement_context: Less common in supplements, found in some protein powders
common_allergens.notes: Less common in supplements. Found in some protein powders.

common_allergens.supplement_context: Often from cross-contamination in manufacturing
common_allergens.notes: Can cause severe reactions. Often from cross-contamination.

common_allergens.supplement_context: Can cause anaphylaxis, refined peanut oil usually safe
common_allergens.notes: Can cause anaphylaxis. Refined peanut oil usually safe.

common_allergens.supplement_context: Very common in omega-3 supplements
common_allergens.notes: Common in omega-3 supplements. Molecular distillation may reduce allergenicity.

common_allergens.supplement_context: Glucosamine often derived from shellfish
common_allergens.notes: Glucosamine often derived from shellfish. Vegetarian alternatives available.

common_allergens.supplement_context: Contains gluten, important for celiac disease sufferers
common_allergens.notes: Contains gluten. Important for celiac disease sufferers.

common_allergens.supplement_context: Became 9th major allergen in 2021
common_allergens.notes: Became 9th major allergen in 2021. Must be declared.

common_allergens.supplement_context: Used as preservatives, can cause severe reactions especially in asthmatics
common_allergens.notes: Can cause severe reactions, especially in asthmatics. Must be declared if >10ppm.

common_allergens.supplement_context: Natural coloring that can cause reactions worse than artificial colors
common_allergens.notes: Natural coloring that can cause anaphylaxis. Increasingly used to replace artificial colors.

common_allergens.supplement_context: Natural red coloring from insects, can cause allergic reactions
common_allergens.notes: Natural red coloring from cochineal insects. Can cause allergic reactions.

common_allergens.supplement_context: Artificial colors that can cause hyperactivity and allergic reactions
common_allergens.notes: Artificial colors linked to hyperactivity in children and allergic reactions.

common_allergens.supplement_context: Common in B-vitamin supplements and probiotics
common_allergens.notes: Common in B-vitamin supplements. Can cause reactions in sensitive individuals.

common_allergens.supplement_context: Very common as fillers and excipients in supplements
common_allergens.notes: Very common in supplements as fillers. Can cause reactions in corn-sensitive individuals.

common_allergens.supplement_context: Less common in supplements, EU allergen
common_allergens.notes: EU major allergen. Can cause severe reactions including anaphylaxis.

common_allergens.supplement_context: Rare in supplements, EU allergen
common_allergens.notes: EU major allergen. Can cause respiratory and skin reactions.

common_allergens.supplement_context: Rare in supplements, EU allergen
common_allergens.notes: EU major allergen. Can cause severe reactions, especially in peanut-allergic individuals.

common_allergens.supplement_context: Common thickener in liquid supplements and capsules, derived from seaweed
common_allergens.notes: Seaweed-derived thickener linked to digestive inflammation. May trigger seaweed allergies.

common_allergens.supplement_context: Vague term that can hide major allergens like milk, eggs, soy, nuts
common_allergens.notes: Can contain undisclosed allergens. Only major allergens must be declared separately.

common_allergens.supplement_context: Common whitening agent in pills and capsules, banned in EU food
common_allergens.notes: Generally safe but banned as food additive in EU due to potential health concerns.

common_allergens.supplement_context: Anti-caking agent in powders and tablets
common_allergens.notes: Generally safe but may cause respiratory irritation in sensitive individuals.

common_allergens.supplement_context: Solvent and excipient in liquid supplements and soft gels
common_allergens.notes: Can cause severe allergic reactions including anaphylaxis in rare cases.

common_allergens.supplement_context: Preservative and solvent in liquid supplements
common_allergens.notes: May cause contact dermatitis and allergic reactions in sensitive individuals.

common_allergens.supplement_context: Common lubricant in tablets and capsules, can be animal or plant-derived
common_allergens.notes: Generally safe but source (animal vs plant) not always disclosed. May affect absorption.

common_allergens.supplement_context: Capsule shells, not suitable for vegetarians/vegans
common_allergens.notes: Animal-derived protein. Halal/kosher concerns, not suitable for vegetarians/vegans.

common_allergens.supplement_context: Filler and binder, may be corn-derived causing corn allergies
common_allergens.notes: Plant cellulose filler. Source plant may trigger allergies (corn, wood, cotton).

common_allergens.supplement_context: Lubricant and emulsifier, can be animal or plant-derived
common_allergens.notes: Generally safe but source (animal vs plant) affects vegetarian/vegan suitability.

common_allergens.supplement_context: Vegetarian capsule shells, may contain carrageenan traces
common_allergens.notes: Plant-derived capsule material. Some formulations may contain carrageenan.
